summary: While investigating the disappearance of a chemist, a detective uncovers a larger conspiracy to unsettle Calcutta.
cast: Sushant Singh Rajput|Anand Tiwari|Neeraj Kabi|Divya Menon|Swastika Mukherjee|Meiyang Chang|Mark Bennington|Taka Higuchi|Shivam|Kaushik Ghosh|Anindya Pulak Banerjee|Arindol Bagchi|Peter Wong|Pradipto Kumar Chakraborty|Manoshi Nath|Moumita Chakraborty|Tirtha Mallick|Shaktipada Dey|Prasun Gayen|Aryann Bhowmick|Nishant Kumar|Prashant Kumar|Sandip Bhattacharya|Piyali Ray|Kanwaljeet Singh Banga
title: Detective Byomkesh Bakshy!
